alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Florence and northwestern Marion Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Timmonsville to near Marion. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Lake City, Timmonsville, Pamplico, Effingham, Rains, Gresham, Evergreen, Francis Marion University, Brittons Neck, Scranton, Coward, Olanta. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 148 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
